alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:09PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Thunderstorm outflow will impact portions of eastern Sedgwick and southwestern Butler Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1008 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorm outflow along a line extending from Park City to near Augusta. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Clearwater, Douglass, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, East Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport, Northeast Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base and South Wichita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 15. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 34 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
